title: Facebook to unveil new versions of Portal video chat devices this autumn
text: Facebook Inc plans to release new versions of its Portal video chatting devices this autumn, the company's vice president of AR/VR, Andrew Bosworth, said during an interview at the Code Conference in Scottsdale, Arizona.

title: Facebook to unveil new versions of Portal video chat devices this fall
text: Facebook Inc plans to release new versions of its Portal video chatting devices this fall, the company's vice president of AR/VR Andrew Bosworth said during an interview at Code Conference in Scottsdale, Arizona.

title: Oculus sold $5 million worth of Quest content in first 2 weeks on sale
text: Facebook’s Oculus Quest standalone VR headset hasn’t been out long, but VP of AR/VR Andrew Bosworth says the company is already selling a substantial amount of content for the device.

title: Facebook says it’s shipping new Portal hardware in the fall
text: Facebook’s Portal devices may still have plenty of privacy questions lingering around them since launch, but that hasn’t swayed the company’s dedication to bringing more video chat hardware to market. Onstage at Vox Media’s Code Convention, Facebook’s VP of AR/VR Andrew Bosworth shares that sales of the existing hardware were “really good,” but more interestingly […]

title: Facebook VP says new Portal video chat devices are coming in the fall
text: Facebook plans to release new versions of its Portal video chatting devices this fall, Facebook Vice President Andrew "Boz" Bosworth said on Monday.

title: Former Facebook and Google employee reveals companies' cultures
text: Marissa Orr, former Facebook and Google employee and author of the book "Lean Out," joins CNBC's "Closing Bell" to discuss Silicon Valley culture and tech regulation.

title: Facebook's Move Against Huawei Is Symbolic but Toothless
text: Huawei users that want it can still easily install Facebook’s app from two different app stores.

title: Congress takes on Big Tech in hearing on anti-competitive behavior among digital giants
text: Tuesday's hearing is focused on the ways platforms such as Facebook and Google have changed the landscape for the news media.

title: Big tech should voluntarily propose breakup plans, says expert
text: Zach Karabell, Two Rivers Research president, and CNBC's Julia Boorstin join 'The Exchange' to discuss how Facebook's expansion could impact impending regulation.

title: Breaking Up Big Tech Is A Big Task
text: If federal regulators are serious about prosecuting big tech icons for antitrust practices, they’ll probably have to redefine what constitutes a monopoly in the tech industry.

title: McNamee: Facebook and Google, like China, use data to manipulate behavior and it must stop
text: "They are essentially gathering data about everybody, creating these data voodoo dolls and using that to manipulate the choices available to people," warns early Facebook and Google investor Roger McNamee.

title: Why these experts think antitrust changes to big tech won't be sweeping
text: Dina Srinivasan, antitrust scholar, and Michael Katz, Berkeley Haas School of Business professor emeritus, discuss the ongoing antitrust probes looking into big tech firms with CNBC's "Squawk Alley.

title: Facebook has unfairly become the 'boogeyman on privacy,' says ex-general counsel
text: Facebook's first General Counsel Chris Kelly says it'll be hard to prove an antitrust case against big technology companies, like Facebook or Google.

title: Trump on antitrust: EU is right to fine big US tech companies to collect 'easy money'
text: President Trump joins "Squawk Box" by phone to discuss how he thinks the U.S. should handle antitrust concerns about big tech companies like Facebook, Google and Amazon.

title: Trump says Facebook, Amazon and Google were colluding with Democrats against him
text: President Donald Trump discussed big tech and antitrust in a live interview on CNBC’s “Squawk Box.”

title: Former Facebook attorney weighs in on antitrust claims
text: Big tech companies such as Google and Facebook have been under scrutiny from federal regulators.

title: Why this portfolio manager is in 'wait and see mode' on FANG stocks
text: The FAANG stocks have all lost ground in the past month, but there are plenty of silver linings for tech investors.

title: Big tech antitrust investigation hearing: What to expect
text: Fox News Headlines 24/7 anchor Brett Larson on House Judiciary Committee Democrats’ first hearing to pursue regulation of big tech.

title: G20 agrees to wrap up digital tax rules on tech companies like Facebook by 2020
text: Group of 20 finance ministers agreed on Sunday to compile common rules to close loopholes used by global tech giants such as Facebook to reduce their corporate taxes, a final communique issued by the bloc showed on Sunday.

title: Why Breaking Up Big Tech May Reap Rich Profits for Investors
text: NYU professor Scott Galloway believes that the break up of Big Tech will add value for shareholders and create a more competitive environment in tech.
